strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.

specialRules.title: White Scars Transports
description: The Space Marines are a highly mobile army. Because of this the points cost of a detachment usually includes enough transport vehicles to transport it and any upgrades that have been taken. The number of vehicles will always be the minimum needed to carry the formation, you can’t take extras along to cover any losses! The transport vehicles will be Land Raider Crusaders if the detachment is Terminators, Rhinos for any other form of detachment.

Note that many formations don’t receive transports, usually because they can’t fit into them. Detachments that come with vehicles will be noted as having plus transport in the Units section of the detachment list below. White Scars detachments must take the transport vehicles for a detachment—you cannot leave them behind in order to use the unit as a garrison or to be deployed from a Thunderhawk gunship.

In addition you may choose to replace a detachment’s vehicles with drop pods before each game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed. If you choose to do this, all transported detachments in the army must deploy from drop pods—you can’t have some in transport vehicles and some deploying from drop pods. If you do choose to use drop pods, then the affected detachments will enter play in drop pods using the rules for Planetfall (see Planetfall). Note that you will require at least one Space Marine strike cruiser or battle barge to deploy the drop pods from.

usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the White Scars, or one of their successor chapters, using their preferred operational methods.

sections.name: White Scars Support Detachments
sections.description: Two Support Detachments may be fielded per Core Detachment

formations.name: Land Speeder
formations.units: Any five of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado

formations.name: Predator
formations.units: Any four of the following units: Predator Annihilator, Predator Destructor

sections.name: White Scars Aircraft & Imperial Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: White Scars Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment

items.name: Attack Bikes
items.description: Replace up to three White Scars Bikes, or one White Scars Scout Bikes, with an equal number of White Scars Attack or Melta Bikes

items.name: Battle Barge
items.description: Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge

items.name: Commander
items.description: Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation

items.name: Independent
items.description: Allows a Warhound Pack to operate as two independent War Engines. If one Warhound is destroyed, the other one in the pack receives a blastmarker

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Replace up to two Land Raider Crusaders with two Land Raiders each

items.name: Razorbacks
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Snipers
items.description: Give up to four Scouts Sniper

items.name: Typhoons
items.description: Replace up to five Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Typhoons

items.name: Vindicators
items.description: Add up to two White Scars Vindicators
